body:
Dear @mastac81, thank you for contacting us!

Your previous work is not lost, as long as you did not delete the files on your computer. So, let's see if we can help you:
Can you try to export the project file, save this file and import it in a new project? 
Hope this already did the trick!

Hi, no it did not work.

Marianna S.

Sent from my iPad

On 21 Jun 2021, at 08:17, Rens van de schoot ***@***.***> wrote:

﻿

Dear @mastac81<https://github.com/mastac81>, thank you for contacting us!

Your previous work is not lost, as long as you did not delete the files on your computer. So, let's see if we can help you:
Can you try to export the project file, save this file and import it in a new project?
Hope this already did the trick!

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<https://github.com/asreview/asreview/issues/641#issuecomment-864759558>, or unsubscribe<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AURZKJLMW4A6PE55VXPZAE3TT3KQXANCNFSM47AZUJWQ>.
Another option is to delete temporary files, see https://asreview.readthedocs.io/en/latest/intro/installation.html#remove-temporary-files.
Can you copy-paste the code from the CMD, so that we can check if there is another error causing your issue?

All of it,
Last night my computer run into error and was \fixing it\ and needed to restart. This is when that happened.

Marianna

If your browser doesn't open. Please navigate to 'http://localhost:5000/'
